# File generated by Callers's cmake_init.sh
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

# generate list of source files with related compilation command
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON)

# add debug symbols
set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)

#option(USE_CXX_EXCEPTIONS "Enable C++ exception support" ON)
# save temporary files when needed
option(SAVE_TEMPS "Save temporary files" ON)
#option(SAVE_TEMPS "Save temporary files" OFF)

if(SAVE_TEMPS)
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS " -save-temps")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS " -save-temps")
endif()

# add subdirectories when needed


# add path to header files
include_directories("../inc")

# define by default a build target when source files are present
add_executable(div_test test.c
test_division.c)
# test_division.c ../src/division.c)

# add path to external libraries
# target_link_libraries(div_test ../build/src/libdiv_src.a)
#target_link_libraries(div_test /net/alpha.sc2.theresis.org/works/home/balp/src/tests/tests/languages/c/test_frama_c/test_va_multiple_files/build/src/libdiv_src.a)
target_link_libraries(div_test /works/home/balp/third_parties/llvm/tools/clang/tools/extra/callers/tests/test_fc_va_multiple_files/build/src/libdiv_src.a)
